item.title: Coder looking for hoster
item.dc:creator: @Not_a_bot Not_a_bot
item.description:
@Not_a_bot wrote:

I am seeking expierenced and talented teenage coders with no relevant education or work experience aside from RSPS to work on a MMO with a 10,000+ player community (not affiliated through MoparScape).

If interested, please post back the following with your answers.

  1. What are your salary requirements?
  2. Would you be willing to relocate?

Thank you so much for your time.

Read full topic
